tips.TipText: Stand when your hand is 12 through 16 and the dealer has a 2 through 6
Hit when your hand is 12 through 16 and the dealer has 7 through Ace
Hit if the dealer has Aces through 6
Do not hit if you have two 10s
Stand if you have an Ace and a 10
Think about hitting if you have a 4 and 10
After a win bet again to win more
If you lose all your cash load more on in the settings
